      • canCast

        public boolean canCast(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
              Spell spell)
        Checks whether the given Player can cast the given Spell, checking their profession's ability to cast the spell (and therefore returning null if they don't have a profession) and their server permissions
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to check the permissions for
        spell - The Spell to check for the given Player
        Returns:
        Whether the given Player can cast the given Spell
